attributes.action: admit the claim that global warming is not man made and promise to cancel all so called green taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is plenty of scientific evidence that the warming of the planet is cyclical and is caused by the Suns activities and not increased man made C02. This is ignored by those with a vested interest in keeping their very lucrative jobs. It is fuelled by an anti capalist hidden agenda which the politians have jumped on in order to justify controlling our lives and taxing us more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
